column4: well I have a boot problem; I have installed ubuntu desktop edition with Wubi. When selecting Ubuntu it shows the option to press ESC for other boot options, then after the countdown my pc is still running but my monitor says there is no signal.
And I've tried other boot options but still the same problem
my monitor is also a tv-screen; so how do I fix it? Add a command in GRUB?
mmm not sure,, I have one client with hdmi connected tv and it is not working with his ati card
